delete from runner_state_bet where runner_state_id in (select rs.id from runner_state rs, market m where rs.market_id=m.market_id and m.market_time<'2009-11-01 00:00:00' limit 1000);

delete from runner_state_last_bet where runner_state_id in (select rs.id from runner_state rs, market m where rs.market_id=m.market_id and m.market_time<'2009-11-01 00:00:00' limit 1000);

delete from runner_state where id in (select rs.id from runner_state rs, market m where rs.market_id=m.market_id and m.market_time<'2009-11-01 00:00:00' limit 1000);
